H0.text: who was the aztec ruler when the spanish arrived. Acamapichtli

H1.text: who was the aztec ruler when the spanish arrived. Tizoc

H2.text: who was the aztec ruler when the spanish arrived. Ahuizotl

H3.text: who was the aztec ruler when the spanish arrived. Moctezuma II

A4.text: Moctezuma Xocoyotzin (c. 1466 – 29 June 1520), retroactively referred to in European sources as Moctezuma II, and often simply called Montezuma, was the ninth emperor of the Aztec Empire (also known as the Mexica Empire), reigning from 1502 or 1503 to 1520.

A5.text: When Cortés arrived in 1519, Moctezuma was immediately informed and he sent emissaries to meet the newcomers.
